verbs.description: [V: Forgive] [ARG1: just a pinch of cynical hyperbole] . For better or worse , the recent summit meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - un in Singapore was announced and thrown toget

Forgive just a pinch of cynical hyperbole . For better or worse , the recent summit meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - un in Singapore [V: was] announced and thrown toget

Forgive just a pinch of cynical hyperbole . [ARGM-ADV: For better or worse] , [ARG1: the recent summit meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - un in Singapore] was [V: announced] and thrown toget

Forgive just a pinch of cynical hyperbole . [ARGM-ADV: For better or worse] , [ARG1: the recent summit meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - un in Singapore] was announced and [V: thrown] [ARGM-PRP: toget]
